short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Zeroes the tip value on the IndieGoGo payment page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension is activated when navigating to the https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/<project-name>/payments/new page. It waits for the 'Other Amount' UI to appear, and when it does, this is selected, and a zero amount is added to it.
